name: SHA1NSEC3Digest
description: Implements the DNSSEC iterated SHA1 digest used for NSEC3 records.

parameterDecorators.name: salt
parameterDecorators.description: The salt value to use on each iteration.

parameterDecorators.name: iterations
parameterDecorators.description: The number of iterations to perform.

returnDecorators.description: The result of the iterated hash operation.
